channel.title: Ok..Dumb quesion
channel.description: ok I know you may possibly lock this but I find this help anyway when I make something with paint or w/e and I save it how come if I do something with red or blue they come out extra blury like they are all blury?I would really apprciate if someone will respond to my question thanks :D

item.title: Ok..Dumb quesion
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

It depends on the format you save it under. If you save it as a .bmp, the quality is going to be less than that of a .jpeg. Different formats have different types of compression. Some may remove contrast, others may reduce image size. Or may not have a degree of transparency. If youâ€™re make a simple image with two different colors, then save it as a .jpeg, or .bmp. Depending on how you want the quality to be.

Read full topic
